emuInput.TitMainTitle: Boy standing along Batavia Street in muddy lot with parked cars with building with sign reading "Bennett Dist. Co." and Sunoco gas station in background
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 1, 1958, page A2, reads: "Walk in Mud of Get Hit - Youngsters traveling to and from Bennett School, on this section of Batavia St., near Bennett St., must walk in deep mud because there are no good sidewalks. Batavia St. is in vicinity of Oakwood and Bennett, and accommodates less than five families. The absence of a large bloc of potential voters could be the reason for an accumulation of mud and slush. - Harris Photo."
